During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Frostflake Heron" [[Kamisato Ayaka]] ({{Cryo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

During the event, the 4-star characters "Eclipsing Star" [[Ningguang]] ({{Geo}}), "Frozen Ardor" [[Chongyun]] ({{Cryo}}), and "Wise Innocence" [[Yanfei]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
